description.en:
XX Platform is an investment trading platform that combines a multifunctional cabinet with investment elements and a trading service with a set of analytical tools and an asset management program.

The work of XX Platform is implemented using a symbiosis of 2 functionalities: dApps on TRON for conducting transactions and distributing coins to token holders, and a web platform for calculating storage reward payments. Storing tokens in a web wallet on the platform allows you to participate in staking XXP token.

XX Platform has its native XXP token implemented as a TRC20 token standard on the TRON Blockchain.
